org.baswell.httproxy
Class EndProxiedRequestException

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Throwable
      java.lang.Exception
          org.baswell.httproxy.EndProxiedRequestException
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class EndProxiedRequestException
extends java.lang.Exception

When thrown from ProxyDirector.onRequestStart(HttpRequest) methods the response code will be returned to the client and the connection closed.

See Also:
